task.title: Modifying a Header's Content
task.shortdesc: To change a Header's content you should know what type of header it is and then call it's appropriate setter method. All headers also have a setFieldBodyModel() method that accepts a mixed parameter and delegates to the correct setter.

step.cmd: Get the HeaderSet from the entity by via its getHeaders() method.
Get the Header by using the HeaderSet's get() as described in .
Call the Header's appropriate setter method as described in or call the header's setFieldBodyModel() method.

result.p: The header will be updated inside the HeaderSet and the changes will be seen when the message is sent.
